prompt: Spacetime region on which we solve the wave equation up to the cosmological horizons. We solve a sequence of finite problems, i.e. we consider a solution $\psi_T$ with prescribed data on $\Sigma_{r_0}^T\cup C_T^c \cup \overline{C}_T^c$, and then show that the limit $\lim_{T \rightarrow\infty}\psi_T$ exists in a suitable energy space.
